Before moving to Chicago, King Oliver was based out of this city, which was also the birthplace of the performer of the “Jelly Roll Blues,” the pianist Jelly Roll Morton. For 10 points, name this birthplace of Louis Armstrong where many Creole and Dixieland bands were formed in the Jazz Age.
